title: Gordon Meiklejohn Endowed Chair for Internal Medicine
description: To provide financial support for a distinguished faculty member holding the Gordon Meiklejohn Endowed Chair for Internal Medicine and/or academic enrichment within the Department of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide financial support for a distinguished faculty member holding the Gordon Meiklejohn Endowed Chair for Internal Medicine and/or academic enrichment within the Department of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
